activities: Market Probe is a marketing research company specializing in customer satisfaction research.  We receive customer data from our clients that may include name, phone, address, client id.
personaldata: All data received from a client or customer falls within the scope of the Safe Harbor Framework.
privacyprograms: A self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
